price: Twanamushyize mu mpuhwe zacu. Mu by’ukuri yari mu ntungane.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhu fī raḥmatinā innahu mina al-ṣāliḥīna
